com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
Interface HitTest

All Known Subinterfaces:
MPointCollection, MultiPoint, MZPointCollection, PointCollection, Polygon, Polyline
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseMultiPoint, BasePointsArray, BasePolygon, BasePolyline, Envelope, MBasePointsArray, MZBasePointsArray, Point
public interface HitTest

This interface implements a method to allow selection of a vertex within a MultiPoint, Polygon, or Polyline feature.

Method Summary
 boolean hitTest(Point queryPoint, double searchRadius, HitResult result)
          Searches for the closest vertex within the specified search radius.
 

Method Detail

hitTest

public boolean hitTest(Point queryPoint,
                       double searchRadius,
                       HitResult result)
Searches for the closest vertex within the specified search radius. If a hit is found, the contents of the HitResult will be updated accordingly. If no hit is found, the contents of the HitResult will be undefined.

Parameters:
queryPoint - the center of the search radius
searchRadius - the maximum distance to consider
result - the vertice which is closest to the query point
Returns:
a boolean value - True if a hit is found, else False
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if queryPoint or result is null, or searchRadius < EPSILON
